experience.title: Globant
experience.description:
We are a digitally native company where innovation, design and engineering meet scale. We use the latest technologies in the digital and cognitive field to empower your organization in every aspect. Globant has more than 22,000 professionals and we are present in 17 countries working for companies like LinkedIn, BBVA, EA, and Coca Cola, among others. We were named a Worldwide Leader of Digital Strategy Consulting Services by IDC MarketScape report (2016 and 2017) We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.
